title: One Must Protect The Academy's Peace

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Everything is all clear at the moment, but... 
I can't shake it off.
The unmistakable "scent" of an impending incident...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
!
Good work today, Boss.
choice_data_list: You too. What're you up to?
You too. What're you up to?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Copy!
You see, there's been a string of repeated vandalism incidents recently.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
The site is that garden you can see over there.
The incidents seem to follow a pattern, always occuring the day after a mock race.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: There was a mock race held yesterday, so ever since this morning, I've taken it upon myself to use my free time to stake things out from a nearby position.
choice_data_list: All this for the school... Awesome job!
All this for the school... Awesome job!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Copy!!
I am truly honored to hear that, Boss!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ...However... Our lunch break is about to end. I'm loath to put the investigation on hold, but I cannot allow myself to skip class... Kgh...!

choice_data_list: How about I cover for you?
How about I cover for you?
text_block_list.text: Seems she was worried about what would happen if the culprit came to the scene while she was still in class. I had some work to do in the afternoon, but I could always reschedule.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: No, I couldn't possibly impose...
choice_data_list: I can't them get away with this, either.
I can't them get away with this, either.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ...Of course, Boss! I would expect nothing less from such a paragon of justice as you! If you'll excuse me, I leave this investigation in your capable hands!
I took over the stakeout for a decent while. Staring at the same thing for so long got me a little sleepy. But, just as the bell rang, marking the end of the school day――

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Good work! I've brought some anpan and milk.
...So, how's the situation?
There was an Umamusume at the scene of the crime, carefully looking around her. Not long after, she stepped closer to the flowers, and with a great big swing of her legs――

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ...We've caught her red handed! Moving in!!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: You there! Vandalizing a garden is a direct violation of the rules, I will have you know!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Guh!! Oh crap...!!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
STOP RIGHT THERE!!
URAAAAAAGGHHH!! YOU'RE      UNDER       ARREST!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: The time is fourteen fifty-seven. Suspect is in custody!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
You have the right to remain silent regarding my questions.
――So, what was your motive for vandalizing the garden?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
It's no big deal. I'm just in a bad mood.
...'Cause I never win any of my races...
choice_data_list: ...So this is because you were losing?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Is that so bad? Look, I only broke the cheap ones, so it's no big deal, right?
Can't we just call it stress relief and drop it?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: WE    ABSOLUTELY    CANNOT!!

choice_data_list: Meno's looking out for your future.
Meno's looking out for your future.
text_block_list.text:
Fenomeno's forcefulness made the other girl shrink back.
But she wasn't yelling for yelling's sake.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: M-my future...?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Making excuses for yourself like "It's no big deal" is a slippery slope. Eventually, you won't be able to stop yourself from giving in to your worst impulses!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Your conduct can seriously impact your future!
I ask that you reflect on your actions and control yourself from now on!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: And one more thing! The next time you find yourself troubled, do not keep it to yourself! Come to me for help!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Protecting your future is one of my most important missions!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Boss, thanks to you, we managed to close this case.
I thank you from the bottom of my heart for your cooperation!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Now then, we need to do some questioning with the disciplinary committee. May I ask that you come with me?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Mmhm... I'm, uh, really sorry for the trouble. Tell that trainer, too... It wasn't even their job, but because of me they had to keep watch like that...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
..........
...No, there's no need for you to worry.
